To learn how to activate an E-Card, read the instructions \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/download/attachments/720476328/%D0%9A%D0%B0%D0%BA%20%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%20%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81%D0%BA.docx?version=1&modificationDate=1547120203075&api=v2\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please
